    • About Alex Yu


    Alexander Yu graduated Magna Cum Laude from Chapman University in Business with an emphasis in real estate. His previous careers involved working with high net worth investment advisory clients and a real estate advisory role with JPMorgan Chase. During his tenure working alongside the wealthy and representing the interests of the Fortune 500 bank, he realized that homeownerâs deserved the same quality of service and insight into the changing real estate market. In his free time, he volunteers and donates his resources to causes including youth services, animal care and homelessness.

    He consistently ranks in the top tier of productive agents and prides himself on being a resource and helping others reach their real estate goals. Whether it is a first home or tenth investment property, he is an invaluable asset. For buyers, he provides key market analysis and creates strategies to win offers. For sellers, he provides cutting edge marketing and a global reach to get homes sold for the highest dollar amount in the shortest span of time.
